com.myscript.atk.sltw

Interface SingleLineTextWidgetApi.OnGestureListener

  • Enclosing interface:
    SingleLineTextWidgetApi

    public static interface SingleLineTextWidgetApi.OnGestureListener
    Interface definition for callbacks to be invoked when gestures are detected.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onInsertGesture(int index)
      Called when an insert gesture is detected.
      void onJoinGesture(int index)
      Called when a join gesture is detected.
      void onPinchGesture()
      Called when a pinch gesture is detected.
      void onReturnGesture(int index)
      Called when a return gesture is detected.
      void onSelectionGesture(int start, int end)
      Called when a selection (encircled) gesture is detected.
      void onSingleTapGesture(int index)
      Called when a single tap gesture is detected.
      void onUnderlineGesture(int start, int end)
      Called when an underline gesture is detected.

    • Method Detail

      • onSingleTapGesture

        void onSingleTapGesture(int index)
        Called when a single tap gesture is detected.
        Parameters:
        index - Index of the character tapped by the user.

      • onInsertGesture

        void onInsertGesture(int index)
        Called when an insert gesture is detected.
        Parameters:
        index - Character index before which insert gesture is detected.

      • onJoinGesture

        void onJoinGesture(int index)
        Called when a join gesture is detected.
        Parameters:
        index - Character index before which join gesture is detected.

      • onReturnGesture

        void onReturnGesture(int index)
        Called when a return gesture is detected.
        Parameters:
        index - Character index before which return gesture is detected.

      • onSelectionGesture

        void onSelectionGesture(int start,
                      int end)
        Called when a selection (encircled) gesture is detected.
        Parameters:
        start - Character index of the first character of the selected word.
        end - Character index past the last character of the selected word.

      • onUnderlineGesture

        void onUnderlineGesture(int start,
                      int end)
        Called when an underline gesture is detected.
        Parameters:
        start - Character index of the first character of the underlined word.
        end - Character index past the last character of the underlined word.

      • onPinchGesture

        void onPinchGesture()
        Called when a pinch gesture is detected.
